message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and functionality. Given its unique features and high standards, we believe its value exceeds $120. Considering this, I would like to extend to you an exclusive offer of $150 for the product. I am confident that you will find its benefits and quality to be well worth the investment. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this opportunity further.
